title: Crowd of men, women, and children, including girl in center wearing braided hairstyle, striped sweater, and light colored shirt, gathered at doorway with men in military uniforms, with 2nd Army insignia on helmets, on other side, and sign on right of doorway that reads "Overnight Sleeping Car Service BOSTON ALBANY MASSENA TORONTO Eastern Standard Time Lv.
